name: Infinity Coloring Pixel
description:
This is the coloring game that the player has to fill color that matches with the number.

This is the coloring game. The level has a palette and a canvas. Each color on the palette has a number. The canvas contains pixels and has a number on each pixel. You have to choose a color on the palette and paint each pixel that has the same number. Paint all pixels to finish it. Have fun.

Over 150 Levels and more UPDATE FOR FREE

Control
- Left-click for painting and selecting color
- Right-click or middle-click for move around the picture.
- Scroll up or down for zoom in, zoom out and scroll color palette.
